var out = {}

out.payload = {
    "data": [
        1000*msg.payload,
        1500*msg.payload,
        1750*msg.payload,
        1250*msg.payload,
        1400*msg.payload,
        1600*msg.payload,
        1200*msg.payload,
        1300*msg.payload,
        1550*msg.payload
    ],
    "wavelengths": [
        415,
        445,
        480,
        515,
        555,
        590,
        630,
        680,
        910
    ]
}

return out
